title: Devil Mom stands by while 'boyfriend' rapes, murders, dismembers her own teen-girl daughter Grace Packer
itunes:title: Devil Mom stands by while 'boyfriend' rapes, murders, dismembers her own teen-girl daughter Grace Packer
description:
Jacob Sullivan admitted that he raped, tortured, and murdered his girlfriend’s 14-year-old daughter, Grace Packer, in July 2016. When a Bucks County judge sentenced the Pennsylvania man to death after a jury recommendation, she told Sullivan "You have no soul!" Nancy Grace looks at the Grace Packer case with a panel including forensic psychiatrist Dr. Daniel Bober, North Carolina family and divorce lawyer Kathleen Murphy, forensics expert Karen Smith, South Carolina medical examiner Dr. Michelle Dupre, and Crime Stories Reporter Robyn Walensky.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
